item.title: Halloween 2019: Knight and Dragon
Metal Etching with the Glowforge
item.description: Warning Metal etching can be dangerous! If you’re going to try this, make sure to read all red the warning text at the bottom of the Edinburgh Etch page first! Also note that copper is reflective. Laser forum users warn that thereâ€™s a risk of the beam bouncing off the copper and back into the laser head. I scuffed the copper prior to lasering to avoid this, but I’m not certain how big of a risk this is.
